HPI 8077 Nissan Skyline GT-R 1993 JTC Series 6th/5th Place H. Yokoshima/T. Kristensen

Tom Kristensen was knighted by the Queen of Denmark and holds the record for the most wins at the 24 Hours of Le Mans (9). While not nearly as exciting, he also drove in the JTC series in 1992 & 1993 earning 2 wins.

Hisashi Yokoshima and Tom Kristensen dove this BP Oil Skyline for the Object T in the final season of the Group A-based JTC championship. Their best result was a win in round 9, the Fuji Inter-Tec 500 at Fuij Speedway. Yokoshima & Kristensen finished the season in 6th & 5th places respectively.
